questions.text: Which of the following best describes your primary back-end development language?
How often do you use containerization technologies (e.g., Docker) in your back-end development projects?
Which of the following aspects of back-end development do you find most challenging?
How important do you consider a strong understanding of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) to be for back-end developers today?
Beyond core languages (e.g., Python, Java), which back-end frameworks or tools do you find most valuable in your workflow, and why?
Describe a recent back-end development project you're particularly proud of. What specific technical challenges did you overcome, and what did you learn from the experience?
When designing a complex back-end system, how do you balance performance, scalability, and maintainability? Can you share an example of a specific approach you've taken?
